Owlhawk's mouth dropped as a thought occured to him.

Owlhawk:  KUP!  HAVE YOU SEEN TALOS SINCE THE BATTLE!

He ran to the exit, went into his fuzor
hawk/owl/cybernetic mode and set of for the
battlefield activating a rocket on his back for
maximum speed.

OOC:  I'll take over Talos for the post where he
actually dies, and have him tell Owlhawk he appoints
Hot Rod his predicessor.

--- x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@...> wrote:
> Alright. That sounds like a good idea. =)
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> > OOC: Ok so he is gone. I guess we'll have to come
> up with a story 
> to fix that. I volunteer to take over. I've done it
> before(Prowl 
> before the restart, and Hot Rod's many time as
> "acting commander") 
> and I'm willing to do it again. Hot Rod would be the
> best suited for 
> the job I believe.
> >
